payload.text: As more feedback rolls in, tweak your programs based on action plans to increase learning experience effectiveness.

payload.text: Learners receive evaluations upon course completion, while Admins can start seeing results roll in via ready-to-go dashboards.

payload.text: Your job as a cybersecurity leader is to manage cybersecurity risk, which includes identifying, treating, and monitoring your overall threat landscape.
payload.caption: Secure Connection

payload.text: It’s not surprising given the increase in threats and vulnerabilities, and the expanding regulatory demands.
payload.caption: Web Threat

payload.text: Gartner research found “Eighty-eight percent of Boards of Directors (BoDs) view cybersecurity as a business risk, as opposed to a technology risk.
payload.caption: Abstract City

payload.text: Using an automated solution that measures the risk of those third-parties based on attack surface assessments for vulnerabilities is an even better first step.
payload.caption: Computer Connection Security

payload.text: By employing an automated platform solution, you can continue to monitor and manage cyber risk more continuously to identify new threats and vulnerabilities to the organization as they develop, than compared to point in time assessments.
payload.caption: Virus Trojan Spyware Signpost Showing Internet Or Computer Threats

payload.text: Through both active and passive assessments, you get the most current and accurate visibility of risks your organization is exposed to.

payload.text: FortifyData platform enables you to identify and manage your risk exposure across your entire attack surface.

payload.text: Third-party risk management is a critical component of enterprise risk management.
